question:
Write a letter of complaint about late delivery to the website where you ordered an item. In the letter, you should tell:-
- What item did you order?
- Why and when did you order that item?
- How would you like them to resolve this issue?
text: I am writing this letter to show my immense dissatisfaction and to lodge a complaint against the delayed delivery of Whey Protein product from your website.

At the onset, I ordered this protein supplement on the 9th of this month and there was a special offer of fast delivery for prime members. As it was my bodybuilding competition on the 18th, I was in need of this supplement and for this I purchased prime membership with number p234546 on the day. However, when I received the product on 22nd, all my anticipation of getting this product delivered in next three working days and related to my competition went in vain.

I am so annoyed with such a low speed service from your side. Thus, I require some early resolutions for this late delivery. Primarily, I want you to refund my money because the delivery was made against the prime member policy. Further, kindly take some strict action against the concerned official so as to resolve the issue in the future. Lastly, If you are not ready to pay me back, a legal discourse would be followed against you.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
